original_text: “Watch out for false prophets. They come to you in sheep’s clothing, but inwardly they are ferocious wolves.
korean_text: 거짓 선지자들을 삼가라 양의 옷을 입고 너희에게 나아오나 속에는 노략질하는 이리라

sentences.original_text: They come to you in sheep's clothing,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 양의 옷을 입고 너희에게 오지만,

sentences.original_text: but inwardly they are ferocious wolves.
